title: SSO and SAML 2.0 federation
description: Support enterprise single sign-on via SAML 2.0 identity providers including Okta, Azure AD, and OneLogin with JIT user provisioning. Tracked in TASK-1267.

title: Saved field mapping templates
description: Allow users to save column-to-field mapping configurations as reusable templates for recurring imports from the same data source. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Microsoft Teams integration
description: Deliver notifications, report snapshots, and interactive action cards directly to Microsoft Teams channels and group chats.

title: Custom role and permission builder
description: Allow admins to define custom roles with fine-grained permission sets controlling access to features, data scopes, and administrative actions.

title: Billing API for programmatic invoice access
description: Expose a REST API allowing customers to programmatically retrieve invoices, payment history, and current subscription details.

title: Salesforce bi-directional sync
description: Sync accounts, contacts, and opportunity data between the platform and Salesforce with configurable field mappings and conflict resolution.

title: Pre-built dashboard templates for common use cases
description: Offer a gallery of ready-made dashboard templates for SaaS metrics, marketing analytics, support operations, and executive summaries. Related: PROJ-{num}

title: Incremental and delta import mode
description: Support incremental imports that only process new or changed records since the last import run, based on a user-specified timestamp or ID column.

title: Team-based access control and workspaces
description: Organize users into teams that map to organizational units, each with independent workspace access, data visibility, and permission inheritance.

title: SFTP scheduled imports
description: Connect to customer SFTP servers on a configurable schedule to automatically fetch and import new data files with processing confirmation notifications.

title: Slack workspace notifications
description: Push alerts, report summaries, and activity notifications to designated Slack channels with customizable formatting. See JIRA-{num} for implementation details.

title: Guest and external collaborator accounts
description: Invite external users with limited, time-bound access to specific projects or dashboards without requiring a full seat license.

title: Typeahead suggestions with recent history
description: Show real-time search suggestions as users type, combining popular queries, recent search history, and matching entity names.

title: Search analytics and query performance dashboard
description: Track search query volumes, zero-result rates, click-through patterns, and average response times to identify content gaps.

title: Payment method management portal
description: Allow users to add, remove, and set default payment methods including credit cards, ACH bank transfers, and wire transfer instructions.
